SEARCH
Module com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord
Package com.marginallyclever.ro3.node.nodes.crab

Class Crab

java.lang.Object
com.marginallyclever.ro3.node.Node
com.marginallyclever.ro3.node.nodes.crab.Crab
public class Crab extends Node

Crab controller demo.

Leg index

 0 - center left
 1 - front right
 2 - front left
 3 - center right
 4 - back left
 5 - back right

 Forward
  2   1
  3 x 0 Right
  4   5

Pose format

pose is a compact array of 18 doubles. the format is coxa/femur/tibia for each leg. the sequence follows the leg index.

    • solveKinematicsForOneLeg

      public void solveKinematicsForOneLeg(CrabLeg leg, javax.vecmath.Point3d newPosition)
      If the kinematics are unsolvable the angles will be NaN and the leg bones will disappear.
      Parameters:
      leg - the leg to move
      newPosition - the desired world position of the toe tip.

    • fromJSON

      public void fromJSON(org.json.JSONObject from)
      Description copied from class: Node
      Deserialize this node and its children from a JSON object and its children. Classes that override this method should call super.fromJSON(). When they do it will trigger the creation of child nodes. The child nodes will then call their own fromJSON() methods.
      Overrides:
      fromJSON in class Node
      Parameters:
      from - the JSON object to read from.
